thread.title: This A Walk to Remember Reunion Will Make You Feel All the Emotions
thread.title_full: This A Walk to Remember Reunion Will Make You Feel All the Emotions

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: This A Walk to Remember Reunion Will Make You Feel All the Emotions
text:
It's hard to believe it's already been 15 years since A Walk to Remember taught teenagers everywhere how to sob — and yet even that amount of time can't dull all the emotions Mandy Moore and Shane West's love inspires.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below After the Super Bowl on Sunday, the duo behind Jamie and Landon met up with A Walk to Remember's director Adam Shankman for an epic reunion guaranteed to make you emotional. Sharing a sweet selfie of the trio on Instagram, Mandy wrote, "Welp. These 2 gentlemen are still some of the best around. Loved catching up with ya, @theshanewest and @adamshankman. My ❤ is full."
Welp. These 2 gentlemen are still some of the best around. Loved catching up with ya, @theshanewest and @adamshankman. My ❤ is full. #awalktoremember #reunion
A photo posted by Mandy Moore (@mandymooremm) on Feb 5, 2017 at 10:27pm PST
After Shane reposted the same photo with the caption "had to steal the pic, hun," Adam later took to Instagram to share a snap of his own, revealing that the three of them had spent over three hours catching up at dinner.
Over 3 hour catch up dinner with @mandymooremm and @theshanewest . After 15 years their love is still like the wind: i cant see it but i will always feel it. Love u guys soooo much. #awtrreunion #AWalkToRemember #proudpapa.
A photo posted by Adam Shankman (@adamshankman) on Feb 6, 2017 at 9:32am PST
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below "After 15 years their love is still like the wind: I can't see it but I will always feel it," he wrote, giving a subtle nod to the end of the film.
Excuse me while I sob forever.
Follow Gina on Twitter .
